The EXPOSÉ, UK published an analysis yesterday on VAERS looking at batch
 numbers of COVID-19 FDA authorized vaccines, which discovered the 
shocking result that 100% of the deaths reported following these shots 
came from only 5% of the batches, and we are talking about several 
thousand batches.
Does anyone know how the vaccinations effect the carbon footprint?
It’s going to get worse it’s not going to get any better
Because it was a lie to begin with. They see people won't take the shot so they need a new plan. Hahaha.
